pr_title: Issue #8683: LambdaParameterName throws NPE parsing switch expressions

timeline.message: Issue #8683: LambdaParameterNameCheck throws NPE when parsing switch expressions

timeline.author: pbludov

replies.bodyText:
Causes PMD violation:  PMD Failure: com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.checks.naming.LambdaParameterNameCheck:117 Rule:ConfusingTernary Priority:3 Avoid if (x != y) ..; else ..;.
I've worked around it with a method call, Objects.nonNull(ast.findFirstToken(TokenTypes.PARAMETERS))
replies.author: nmancus1
